use_subfolder.title: 保存图片到子目录(Save image to subdirectory)
use_subfolder.description: 图片会存放在当前工作目录的子目录，子目录不存在则创建(Images will be stored in a subdirectory of the current working directory. Create a subdirectory if it does not exist)

subfolder.title: 存放图片的子目录名称(The name of the subdirectory where the image is stored)

infoalertenable.title: 弹窗信息显示(Whether to display popup information)
infoalertenable.description: 每次贴图等操作右上角弹窗显示状态(In each operation, the pop-up window in the upper right corner displays the status)

description: Markdown快速贴图/删除图片(Quick and easy to paste/delete pictures in Markdown)
name: markdown-image-paste-delete
